Who Dis?.question: In 2011, this person won an all paid trip for two to London for a Bon Jovi concert

When in 9th std., this person was suspended from school for a week for bursting crackers in class with friends for protesting to having their PT class hijacked multiple times. One of the friends forged each of their parent's signatures and neither mentioned at home about what happened and instead played cricket during the suspension
As a kid, this person painted half of a bedside lamp in order to paint it grey. Unfortunately, it looked terrible, so he/she turned the lamp facing the good side so that no one would find out.
This person and brother-in-law couldn't help but burst into muffled laughter when they heard that a relative fell into the drainage and was hurt by the lid.
This person went up their apartment building's stairs to hide and scared the spouse from behind as he/she was trying to open the main door. And loves scaring the spouse at every oppurtunity.

On their first anniversary, this person came home early, dressed well and waited with a dozen red roses and a gift only to get a call 2 hours later from the spouse about a flat tire. He/she then dressed back into regular clothes to save his/her damsel(/gentleman) in distress.

During a work trip to Italy, one day, this person withdrew 700,000 liras at the bank. The bank teller warned asking the person to guard the money safe. Wondering why he'd say that and thinking that the hotel was just 5 minutes away, he/she decided to ignore that and continued back to the hotel. On the way, a Hispanic woman came begging for money. The person handed out some money and continued walking. On reaching the hotel, the person realised that 100,000 liras were missing and were stolen by the beggar.

When in school, not being allowed to go out of school during recess, this person and friends used to go behind the school and jump over the compound wall to have lunch at a Shwarma place, and then climb back in before recess ended
As a kid, this person and friends sprinkled powder all over an Aunt's bedroom and put Nivea all over her mirror
